thread.section_title: Pacific Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Nice hotel.
thread.title_full: Nice hotel. - Review of Pacific Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: dr_agon_2
title: Nice hotel.
text:
The staff was very helpful, and there was no problem with communication in English. The room was simple, but comfortable. The bathroom was larger than I expected, very clean and nice. The only thing I missed was larger desk or table for work. WiFi worked reliably, but with rather low speed.
The location of this hotel is a great asset. Easily accessible from metro (2-3minutes walk).
